name.description: The name of the station. Max 400 chars

homepage.description: The homepage URL of the station

favicon.description: The URL of an image file (jpg or png)

countrycode.description: The 2 letter countrycode of the country where the radio station is located

state.description: The name of the part of the country where the station is located

language.description: The main language used in spoken text parts of the radio station

tags.description: A list of tags separated by commas to describe the station

geo_lat.description: The latitude of the stream location

geo_long.description: The longitude of the stream location
